Personal archive, notes and works in progress.  
Every Day I Write The Book.

:::
:::

###
 
###

This web site is an attempt to bring the software engineering paradigm
of "Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment" to to my personal
work, be it technical, literary, epistolary, journaling, note-taking,
brainstorming, indexing, archiving etc.

My intent is to bring together everything I've preserved of my past
efforts and document the process of creating new stuff, in what used to
be called "postmodern" fashion -- showing my work and all the messy
parts.

I aspire, via this site and the [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) publishing
platform, to organize my work into volumes, which can be released in
ebook and print-ready formats in continuous editions updated with every
iteration of the site.  Each step of the authoring, editing, compiling
and publishing process will be captured and laid bare for posterity in a
[Github repository](https://github.com/huntley-link).
